meanings.definition: A drug used to treat allergies and relieve symptoms of allergic reactions.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed cyproheptadine to help with my allergy symptoms.
meanings.sent2: Many people find relief from their allergies by taking cyproheptadine.
meanings.sent3: I sneezed so much that I joked about needing a whole bottle of cyproheptadine!
meanings.sent4: Her allergy symptoms vanished as if cyproheptadine was a magic potion.
meanings.sent5: The image of cyproheptadine saving me from sneezing fits stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: A medication that can help stimulate appetite and promote weight gain.
meanings.sent1: After taking cyproheptadine, my appetite increased significantly.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes use cyproheptadine to help with weight gain.
meanings.sent3: I joked that cyproheptadine turned me into a bottomless pit for food!
meanings.sent4: Her desire to eat grew like a wildfire after starting cyproheptadine.
meanings.sent5: The thought of cyproheptadine making me hungry all the time made me chuckle.

meanings.definition: An antihistamine that can also be used to treat migraine headaches.
meanings.sent1: Cyproheptadine is effective in relieving migraine headaches for many patients.
meanings.sent2: Some people prefer cyproheptadine over other medications for migraines.
meanings.sent3: I playfully called cyproheptadine my 'headache hero'!
meanings.sent4: Her migraines retreated like shadows under the sun with cyproheptadine.
meanings.sent5: The idea of cyproheptadine as a superhero fighting my migraines made me smile.
